name: places/ChIJx7B2LuzzwokRWguAlziassQ
formattedAddress: 200 Riverside Blvd APT 305, New York, NY 10069, USA
adrFormatAddress: 200 Riverside Blvd APT 305, New York, NY 10069, USA

originalText.text:
Sara is a phenomenal designer and architect.  Not only is she very talented, she is so nice and a pleasure to work with.  I was redesigning the space of my law practice and I hired Sara from Studio 360 to draw up the plans.  I initially had an idea about what I wanted to do with the renovation, but when I spoke with Sara, she gave me her ideas which were very different to what I imagined, but it turned out to be terrific and much better than any ideas I had for the space.  I love the way the office came out and all her suggestions and recommendations were spot on.  I have worked with architects before and rarely have I found an architect to understand design so well.  Hiring her saved me from having to hire an architect as well as a designer.

Her advice, perspective and experience were very helpful and instrumental to the ultimate outcome of the project.  She was able to easily communicate the pros/cons of design elements and was able to provide her opinion without pushing an agenda.

I was so happy with her work and the results that I recommended her to one of my clients that need a large office renovation for a space that was gutted.  She designed the office to perfectly fit their needs and the space came out perfect.  She thought of every little thing that was needed to make the space work perfectly for their business.  They were just as ecstatic with their space as I was with mine.

Sara is very easy to communicate with and will go the extra mile to make sure your project is done properly and on time.  I will continue to use Studio 360 for future projects big and small and I would highly recommend them.

originalText.text:
We bought a house in Westchester NY and hired Sara Jazayeri from Studio 360 to renovate our kitchen.

It was clear from our first meeting that she was highly talented, totally understood our style and needs and would be great to work with. We loved her vision for our house so much that we expanded the scope of our original kitchen plan to include the mudroom, powder room, and family room as well.

Our initial impression proved correct as Sara was fantastic to work with. Her combination of architectural expertise and exquisite design taste made us feel confident her plans would be both functional and beautiful. Sara really listened to us and was great at incorporating our ideas and style while helping us to learn and making sure we felt brought along in every step of the process. She was also very respectful of our budget and always available and supportive in answering our questions and responding to any concerns.

In addition to the fantastic working experience and the relationship we built with Sara through the project, the end product is of course also really critical and a testament to the quality of her work. The first part of our multi-pronged project is now complete and our entryway/mudroom is completely transformed. We love every inch of it. It’s amazing what she was able to do with such a small space and we can’t wait to see that same transformation in other areas of our house.

What she has accomplished was beyond our expectations. I had an absolutely wonderful experience with Sara Jazayeri from Studio 360 and cannot wait to continue our work with them!

originalText.text: Working with Sara and the Studio 360 team was the easiest part of my move.  Sara gets to know her clients, and truly designs your home with individualized detail and attention to your environment, aesthetic and personality.  We were blown away by her creativity and genius, as well as her kind and upbeat personality.  It is without reservation that we recommend Studio 360, Sara, and her team... there's no one else I'd trust!

originalText.text:
Sara did a wonderful job with the living room and dining room in our apartment. The living area has a peculiar shape and Sara was able to maximize our sitting space while accommodating a large dining room table. The place looks beautiful while also reflecting the casual style that is ours.
In addition, Sara has continued to be in touch and deal directly with the retail stores for us when we need follow up. Our cocktail table suffered a little under the weight of the books we place on it (it wasn't designed for that level of weight) and Sara had the store replace it free. She continues to be in touch and address our needs
Deborah Zlochower and David Linzer

originalText.text: Sara transformed our attic from storage space to hip living space. She's dependable, creative, and an absolute gem of a person.  She turns your space into a definite "wow" focal point!
